level.heading: Other remedies.
level.text: A protected individual who pursues remedies under this subchapter is not precluded from pursuing other legal or equitable remedies against the respondent.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 14-296, see notes following ยง 16-1041.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 7 of the Uniform Interstate Enforcement of Domestic Violence Protection Orders Act. See 9, Pt. 1B, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
